title: Turkey's Muslim-friendly holidays find a modest place in the sun
text:
Turkey's Muslim-friendly holidays find a modest place in the sun 10:48am EDT - 02:03
Turkey's $26 billion tourism industry has been battered by security fears and political disputes in recent years but one corner of the market is quietly growing - beach holidays for conservative Muslims. Emily Wither reports from Alanya.
